pkgmetadata.longdescription: Gamma and Exponential Generalized Linear Models with Elastic Net Penalty // Implements the fast iterative shrinkage-thresholding algorithm (FISTA) algorithm to fit a Gamma distribution with an elastic net penalty as described in Chen, Arakvin and Martin (2018) arxiv:1804.07780. An implementation for the case of the exponential distribution is also available, with details available in Chen and Martin (2018) https://papers.ssrn.com/abstract_id=3085672.
